Class BinarySearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
BinaryTree<E>
BinarySearchTree<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, SearchTree<E>
public class BinarySearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>> extends BinaryTree<E> implements SearchTree<E>
A class to represent a binary search tree.

      Specified by:
      add in interface SearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      item - The object being inserted
      Returns:

    • delete

      public E delete(E target)
      Starter method delete. post: The object is not in the tree.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface SearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      target - The object to be deleted
      Returns:
      The object deleted from the tree or null if the object was not in the tree
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if target does not implement Comparable

    • remove

      public boolean remove(E target)
      Removes target from tree.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface SearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      target - Item to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the object was in the tree, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if target is not Comparable
